title: Terravail Warwick Trail Tire gets multiple casing and compound options for XC to Enduro
content:
Terravail has introduced a new Trail Tire to their Mountain Bike line-up; the Terravail Warwick, pronounced “War-wick”, not “Worick”, like the English town. Available in 27.5″ and 29″ sizes, with three casings and two rubber compounds to choose from, the Warwick can be applied as a fast-rolling rear tire for aggressive trail riding, or as

The post Terravail Warwick Trail Tire gets multiple casing and compound options for XC to Enduro appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
